com.bugielmarek.crudone.services

Interface IssueService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IssueServiceImpl

    public interface IssueService
    Provides the base model interface for Issue service. Allows creating, reading, updating, deleting, searching issues.
    Author:
    Bugiel Marek

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(Long id)
      Deletes issue
      List<Issue> findListAllIssues()
      Returns list
      List<Issue> findListFromSearchInput(String name)
      Returns list matching name

      Returns issue matching id, the primary key

      Returns page matching user and pageNumber

      Returns page matching pageNumber
      Page<Issue> getPageResultFromSearchInput(FormClass formClass, int pageNumber)

      Saves issue sent by REST client

      • getPageResultFromSearchInput

        Page<Issue> getPageResultFromSearchInput(FormClass formClass,
                                         int pageNumber)
        Returns page matching issue held in formClass and pageNumber
        Parameters:
        formClass - holds issue in it. Issue was created by submitting the form
        pageNumber - indicates which matching page should be returned
        Returns:
        matching page
